Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.22 Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 1.22.1 Anidassanasappaṭighapada » 1.22.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Sahajātādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Anidassanasappaṭighapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Sahajātādi
544.
1219Nahetu anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  aññamaññapaccayena paccayo…  nissayapaccayena paccayo…  atthipaccayena paccayo…  avigatapaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup1.22.2 Anidassanaappaṭighapada >>
